[feature name=demo]

[configurations]
  org.apache.sling.commons.log.LogManager.factory.config-aem-demo-machine
    org.apache.sling.commons.log.pattern="{0,date,dd.MM.yyyy\ HH:mm:ss.SSS}\ *{4}*\ [{2}]\ {3}\ {5}"
    org.apache.sling.commons.log.names=["com.adobe.aem.demomachine.communities"]
    org.apache.sling.commons.log.file="logs/aem-demo-machine.log"
    org.apache.sling.commons.log.level="ERROR"
    org.apache.sling.commons.log.additiv=B"false"
